wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Borden is a British painter based in Hackney, London. He studied at Saint Martin's School of Art and then the Royal College of Art.Nicholas Borden is the brother of photographer Harry Borden and painter Frances Borden.

response: Borden was born in New York and brought up in Devon. He is the brother of painters Nicholas Borden and Frances Borden. He studied photography at Plymouth College of Art and Design (1985-87).

link_mentions.page: List of alumni of the Royal College of Art

response: Frances Borden is the sister of photographer Harry Borden and painter Nicholas Borden.
